thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Aj Qureshi
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Aj Qureshi

author: Aj Qureshi
title: Aj Qureshi
text:
When you're out shopping for gadgets, you're looking at all the shops out there, Mainly for good product collection and prices.
And that's what happened with me when I was out shopping for my gadgets. TomTop came up and I loved the collection and competitive prices they had. I bought a FPV quad, for a price which no other seller had. And the quick delivery topped up the service even more. Where other sellers take up to even 30+ days, TomTop's delivery guys delivered it in less than 30 days. I was Impressed.
Good collection of Items, competitive prices and a good support desk makes TomTop a top end competitor.
You can't go wrong buying from these guys.
Have fun shopping.
